description: Try our easy to follow Grapefruit Margarita Tart With Meringue recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Grapefruit Margarita Tart With Meringue Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: When ready to serve, use an electric mixer to beat egg whites until soft peaks form. Continue beating, adding remaining sugar 1 tbs at a time, until sugar dissolves. Beat for 2 minutes or until thick and glossy. Spoon meringue onto tart and use a kitchen blowtorch to brown meringue. Serve immediately with grapefruit segments.

Beat for 2 minutes or until thick and glossy. Spoon meringue onto tart and use a kitchen blowtorch to brown meringue. Serve immediately with grapefruit segments.
